column4: Good morning all.  Update Manager on my Ubuntu 9.10 laptop only shows that I can upgrade to 10.04.1 LTS, it doesn't show 10.10 as an option.   I do have the "Normal Releases" selected for "Show new distribution releases" option in Upgrade Manager.
Will it not let me skip two release levels like that, or is there something else going on?
I think you need to update to 10.04.1 LTS first
